body_text:
FYI, still intending to clean this up and add tests, just didn't find time
over the weekend. Hopefully will make it into 0.1.11.
…
On Mon, Mar 6, 2017 at 12:04 PM, Luke Yeager ***@***.***> wrote:
 ***@***.**** commented on this pull request.
 ------------------------------

 In torch/utils/data/dataloader.py
 <#908 (comment)>:

 > @@ -72,7 +73,7 @@ def default_collate(batch):
          return torch.LongTensor(batch)
      elif isinstance(batch[0], float):
          return torch.DoubleTensor(batch)
 -    elif isinstance(batch[0], str):

 Looks right to me, yeah.

 —

body:
FYI, still intending to clean this up and add tests, just didn't find time
over the weekend. Hopefully will make it into 0.1.11.

On Mon, Mar 6, 2017 at 12:04 PM, Luke Yeager <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> *@lukeyeager* commented on this pull request.
> ------------------------------
>
> In torch/utils/data/dataloader.py
> <https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/908#discussion_r104509171>:
>
> > @@ -72,7 +73,7 @@ def default_collate(batch):
>          return torch.LongTensor(batch)
>      elif isinstance(batch[0], float):
>          return torch.DoubleTensor(batch)
> -    elif isinstance(batch[0], str):
>
> Looks right to me, yeah.
>
